original: Krook, John Fredrik, civilingenjör, Borås, f. 26/12/85 i Malmö av verkst:-chef Fredrik K. o. Johanna Eriksson. G. 18 m. Stina Lagerstedt. Barn: Carl-Gösta f. 20. ■— Stud:ex. i Malmö 06, civ:ing:ex. v. KTH 09. Stud :resa t. USA S’. statsstip. 16-17. Anst. v. Mell. o. N. Sv:es Ångpannefören. 10-16, v. statens kraftstation i Västerås 17-20, v. Sydsv. Kraft A-B i Malmö 20-23, konsult, ing. i Borås sed. 23. Hiss-besiktn :man. Led. av Sv. tekn :fören. sed. 08.
translated: Krook, John Fredrik, civil engineer, Borås, b. 26/12/85 in Malmö to industrial manager Fredrik K. and Johanna Eriksson. Married 18 to Stina Lagerstedt. Children: Carl-Gösta b. 20. ■— High school graduation in Malmö 06, engineering degree from KTH in 09. Study trip to the USA on a government scholarship 16-17. Employed by Mell. and N. Swed. Steam Boiler Association 10-16, at the state power station in Västerås 17-20, at South Swed. Power A-B in Malmö 20-23, self-employed engineer in Borås since 23. Certified elevator inspector. Member of the Swedish Technical Association since 08.

employmentHistory.name: Mell. and N. Swed. Steam Boiler Association
South Swed. Power A-B in Malmö
